languages.text: "Кровь Трона... Брайс, Штейн, Клейтон, я свидетель вашего последнего суда. Саргона не уйдет от меня — клянусь".
"Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
languages.original_text: "Кровь Трона... Брайс, Штейн, Клейтон, я свидетель вашего последнего суда. Саргона не уйдет от меня — клянусь".

traits.locale_text: "By the blood of the Throne... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am a witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
"By the blood of the Throne... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am a witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
"By the blood of the Throne... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am a witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
"By the blood of the Throne... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am a witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
"Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."
"Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

languages.text: "Thrones Blut ... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, ich bin Zeuge eures letzten Urteils. Sargona wird mir nicht entkommen. Das schwöre ich."
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "Thrones Blut ... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, ich bin Zeuge eures letzten Urteils. Sargona wird mir nicht entkommen. Das schwöre ich."

languages.text: « Par le Trône... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, je serai le témoin de votre jugement final. Sargona ne m'échappera pas. J'en fais le serment. »
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: « Par le Trône... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, je serai le témoin de votre jugement final. Sargona ne m'échappera pas. J'en fais le serment. »

languages.text: «Por la sangre del Trono... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, doy testimonio de vuestro destino final. Sargona no se me escapará. Lo juro».
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: «Por la sangre del Trono... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, doy testimonio de vuestro destino final. Sargona no se me escapará. Lo juro».

languages.text: “黄金王座在上……布莱斯、斯坦因、克莱顿，我见证了你们最终的判决。我绝不会让萨戈纳逃掉，我发誓。”
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座在上……布莱斯、斯坦因、克莱顿，我见证了你们最终的判决。我绝不会让萨戈纳逃掉，我发誓。”

languages.text: 「玉座の血よ…ブライス、スタイン、クレイトン─お前たちの最後のジャッジを、俺が見届けよう。サルゴナを逃しはしない。絶対に」
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: 「玉座の血よ…ブライス、スタイン、クレイトン─お前たちの最後のジャッジを、俺が見届けよう。サルゴナを逃しはしない。絶対に」

languages.text: "Taht aşkına... Bryce, Stein, Clayton. Son hükmünüzün tanığı benim. Sargona elimden kurtulamayacak. Sözümdür."
languages.original_text: "Throne's blood... Bryce, Stein, Clayton, I am witness to your final judgement. Sargona will not escape me. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "Taht aşkına... Bryce, Stein, Clayton. Son hükmünüzün tanığı benim. Sargona elimden kurtulamayacak. Sözümdür."
